teams.name: Team BoardGameGeek.Com
teams.description: We are members of BoardGameGeek.com, the world's largest community of board game fans.

teams.name: IslamicFinance
teams.loan_because: We want to eradicate poverty in all corners of the world.
teams.description: Humanitarian and driven by the Mercy and Compassion of our Creator to give to those less fortunate than ourselves.  To make a difference together as brothers and sisters.

teams.name: Friends of Mission Belt Co
teams.loan_because: We want to give people a hand up, not a hand out, so that they can become self-sufficient and break the poverty cycle.
teams.description: We support Mission Belt Co and its Mission to fight global hunger by donating proceeds from their awesome no-holes belts
